metadata.Title: CVE-2015-4844 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle Java SE 6u101, 7u85, and 8u60, and Java SE Embedded 8u51, allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors related to 2D.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4844` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libicu55 - 55.1-7ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

openjdk-8-demo - 8u66-b17-1build1
openjdk-8-jdk - 8u66-b17-1build1
openjdk-8-jdk-headless - 8u66-b17-1build1
openjdk-8-jre - 8u66-b17-1build1
openjdk-8-jre-headless - 8u66-b17-1build1
openjdk-8-jre-jamvm - 8u66-b17-1build1
openjdk-8-jre-zero - 8u66-b17-1build1
openjdk-8-source - 8u66-b17-1build1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> as of 2016-08-08, no definitive fix in ICU source tree debian has released fix however

criterions.comment: icu package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '55.1-7ubuntu0.1').
openjdk-8 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8u66-b17-1build1').
